scripts.sls:dev: concurrently "rm -rf dist .cache && USER_POOL=`sls output get --name userPool --stage dev` REGION=`sls output get --name region --stage dev` GATEWAY_URL=http://localhost:3000/dev/graphql USER_POOL_CLIENT=`sls output get --name userPoolClient --stage dev` PORT=4000 parcel src/index.html" "AWS_PROFILE=personal sls offline"
scripts.deploy:dev: rm -rf dist .cache && USER_POOL=`sls output get --name userPool --stage dev` REGION=`sls output get --name region --stage dev` GATEWAY_URL=`sls output get --name gatewayUrl --stage dev` USER_POOL_CLIENT=`sls output get --name userPoolClient --stage dev` parcel build src/index.html && AWS_PROFILE=personal sls deploy --stage dev && echo Deployed to `sls output get --name siteUrl --stage dev`
